selectedVerses.text: And when the Philistine looked and saw David, he disdained him, for he was but a youth, ruddy and handsome in appearance.
And he sent and brought him in. Now he was ruddy and had beautiful eyes and was handsome. And the LORD said, "Arise, anoint him, for this is he."
Her princes were purer than snow, whiter than milk; their bodies were more ruddy than coral, the beauty of their form was like sapphire.
